mapper.select: select EC.id,EC.title,EC.price,EC.lesson_num AS lessonNum,EC.cover, ET.name AS teacherName, ES1.title AS subjectLevelOne, ES2.title AS subjectLevelTwo from edu_course EC LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ECD ON ECD.id = EC.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject ES1 ON ES1.id = EC.subject_parent_id LEFT JOIN edu_subject ES2 ON ES2.id = EC.subject_id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher ET ON ET.id = EC.teacher_id WHERE EC.id = #{courseId}
